messages.WikiIntegration.Name: Wiki Integration
messages.WikiIntegration.Description: This mod adds links to the Wiki to Components in Worker Inspectors, and ProtoFlux nodes.
messages.WikiIntegration.WikiHyperlink.Component: Opens the Resonite Wiki article about this Component.
messages.WikiIntegration.WikiHyperlink.ProtoFlux: Opens the Resonite Wiki article about this ProtoFlux node.
messages.WikiIntegration.WikiHyperlink.ComponentC: Opens the Resonite Wiki article about this Category of Components.
messages.WikiIntegration.WikiHyperlink.ProtoFluxC: Opens the Resonite Wiki article about this Category of ProtoFlux nodes.
messages.WikiIntegration.OpenWikiArticleButton.De: Adds the Resonite Wiki button to Components in Worker Inspectors, and ProtoFlux nodes.
messages.WikiIntegration.CategoryWikiArticleButto: Open Wiki Article Button for Categories
Adds the Resonite Wiki button to Categories in Component Selectors and ProtoFlux Node Browsers.
messages.WikiIntegration.ProtoFluxCategoryToggles: Whether to show the Resonite Wiki button on ProtoFlux nodes in the category {0}.
